appDesc.message: Easily download, preview Instagram profile photos, and track follower changes.

profileReadyNotification.message: Profile info is ready! Click the WeXProfile icon to see the details.

notInstagramPageError.message: Please use this on an Instagram profile page.

profileFetchError.message: An error occurred while fetching profile data

notProfilePageError.message: No valid Instagram profile page found. Please visit a user's profile.

openHdPhotoError.message: Failed to open HD profile photo

noCachedDataError.message: No profile data found in cache. Please refresh the page and try again.

popupFetchError.message: Failed to get profile data. Please refresh the page and try again.

clearHistoryConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete the follower change history saved for all profiles?

imageLoadError.message: An error occurred while loading the profile picture.
